an3.62:4.1: “Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, amātāputtikāni bhayānīti assutavā puthujjano bhāsati.
an3.62:4.3: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṃ mahāaggiḍāho vuṭṭhāti.
an3.62:4.4: Mahāaggiḍāhe kho pana, bhikkhave, vuṭṭhite tena gāmāpi ḍayhanti nigamāpi ḍayhanti nagarāpi ḍayhanti.
an3.62:4.5: Gāmesupi ḍayhamānesu nigamesupi ḍayhamānesu nagaresupi ḍayhamānesu tattha mātāpi puttaṃ nappaṭilabhati, puttopi mātaraṃ nappaṭilabhati.
an3.62:4.6: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ amātāputtikaṃ bhayanti assutavā puthujjano bhāsati.
an3.62:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yaṃ mahāmegho vuṭṭhāti.
an3.62:5.2: Mahāmeghe kho pana, bhikkhave, vuṭṭhite mahāudakavāhako sañjāyati.
an3.62:5.3: Mahāudakavāhake kho pana, bhikkhave, sañjāyante tena gāmāpi vuyhanti nigamāpi vuyhanti nagarāpi vuyhanti.
an3.62:5.4: Gāmesupi vuyhamānesu nigamesupi vuyhamānesu nagaresupi vuyhamānesu tattha mātāpi puttaṃ nappaṭilabhati, puttopi mātaraṃ nappaṭilabhati.
an3.62:5.5: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyaṃ amātāputtikaṃ bhayanti assutavā puthujjano bhāsati.
an3.62:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yaṃ bhayaṃ hoti aṭavisaṅkopo, cakkasamāruḷhā jānapadā pariyāyanti.
an3.62:6.2: Bhaye kho pana, bhikkhave, sati aṭavisaṅkope cakkasamāruḷhesu jānapadesu pariyāyantesu tattha mātāpi puttaṃ nappaṭilabhati, puttopi mātaraṃ nappaṭilabhati.
an3.62:6.3: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyaṃ amātāputtikaṃ bhayanti assutavā puthujjano bhāsati.
an3.62:6.4: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi amātāputtikāni bhayānīti assutavā puthujjano bhāsati.
an3.62:7.1: Tāni kho panimāni, bhikkhave, tīṇi samātāputtikāniyeva bhayāni amātāputtikāni bhayānīti assutavā puthujjano bhāsati.
an3.62:7.3: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṃ mahāaggiḍāho vuṭṭhāti.
an3.62:7.4: Mahāaggiḍāhe kho pana, bhikkhave, vuṭṭhite tena gāmāpi ḍayhanti nigamāpi ḍayhanti nagarāpi ḍayhanti.
an3.62:7.5: Gāmesupi ḍayhamānesu nigamesupi ḍayhamānesu nagaresupi ḍayhamānesu hoti so samayo yaṃ kadāci karahaci mātāpi puttaṃ paṭilabhati, puttopi mātaraṃ paṭilabhati.
an3.62:7.6: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ samātāputtikaṃyeva bhayaṃ amātāputtikaṃ bhayanti assutavā puthujjano bhāsati.
an3.62:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yaṃ mahāmegho vuṭṭhāti.
an3.62:8.2: Mahāmeghe kho pana, bhikkhave, vuṭṭhite mahāudakavāhako sañjāyati.
an3.62:8.3: Mahāudakavāhake kho pana, bhikkhave, sañjāte tena gāmāpi vuyhanti nigamāpi vuyhanti nagarāpi vuyhanti.
an3.62:8.4: Gāmesupi vuyhamānesu nigamesupi vuyhamānesu nagaresupi vuyhamānesu hoti so samayo yaṃ kadāci karahaci mātāpi puttaṃ paṭilabhati, puttopi mātaraṃ paṭilabhati.
an3.62:8.5: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyaṃ samātāputtikaṃyeva bhayaṃ amātāputtikaṃ bhayanti assutavā puthujjano bhāsati.
an3.62:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yaṃ bhayaṃ hoti aṭavisaṅkopo, cakkasamāruḷhā jānapadā pariyāyanti.
an3.62:9.2: Bhaye kho pana, bhikkhave, sati aṭavisaṅkope cakkasamāruḷhesu jānapadesu pariyāyantesu hoti so samayo yaṃ kadāci karahaci mātāpi puttaṃ paṭilabhati, puttopi mātaraṃ paṭilabhati.
an3.62:9.3: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyaṃ samātāputtikaṃyeva bhayaṃ amātāputtikaṃ bhayanti assutavā puthujjano bhāsati.
an3.62:9.4: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi samātāputtikāniyeva bhayāni amātāputtikāni bhayānīti assutavā puthujjano bhāsati.
an3.62:10.4: Na, bhikkhave, mātā puttaṃ jīramānaṃ evaṃ labhati:
an3.62:10.6: putto vā pana mātaraṃ jīramānaṃ na evaṃ labhati:
an3.62:11.1: Na, bhikkhave, mātā puttaṃ byādhiyamānaṃ evaṃ labhati:
an3.62:11.3: putto vā pana mātaraṃ byādhiyamānaṃ na evaṃ labhati:
an3.62:12.1: Na, bhikkhave, mātā puttaṃ mīyamānaṃ evaṃ labhati:
an3.62:12.3: putto vā pana mātaraṃ mīyamānaṃ na evaṃ labhati:
an3.62:12.5: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi amātāputtikāni bhayānīti.
an3.62:13.1: Atthi, bhikkhave, maggo atthi paṭipadā imesañca tiṇṇaṃ samātāputtikānaṃ bhayānaṃ imesañca tiṇṇaṃ amātāputtikānaṃ bhayānaṃ pahānāya samatikkamāya saṃvattati.
an3.62:13.2: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo katamā ca paṭipadā imesañca tiṇṇaṃ samātāputtikānaṃ bhayānaṃ imesañca tiṇṇaṃ amātāputtikānaṃ bhayānaṃ pahānāya samatikkamāya saṃvattati?
an3.62:13.4: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
an3.62:13.5: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā imesañca tiṇṇaṃ samātāputtikānaṃ bhayānaṃ imesañca tiṇṇaṃ amātāputtikānaṃ bhayānaṃ pahānāya samatikkamāya saṃvattatī”ti.
